values: To comfort someone means to make them feel better.
I wanted to comfort my friend after I heard the bad news.

To comfort is to provide solace or support to someone who is upset or distressed.
Comfort is a feeling of being relaxed and at ease, often from being in a comfortable place or situation.
noun, verb
